lyrics:
26 contributorstranslationsitalianoi know you care lyricsverse 1
clinging to me
like a last breath you would breathe
you were like home to me
i dont recognise this street

verse 2
please dont close your eyes
dont know where to look without them
outside the cars speed by
id never heard them until now

chorus
i know you care
i know it has always been there
but theres trouble ahead i can feel it
you are just saving yourself when you hide it
yeah i know you care
i see it in the way that you stare
as if there was trouble ahead and you knew it
ill be saving myself from the ruin
and i know you care

verse 3
i used to run down the stairs
to the door when i thought you were there
too shaped to the comfort of us
two lovers locked out of love
see ellie goulding liveget tickets as low as 65you might also likechorus
oh but i know you care
i know it has always been there
but theres trouble ahead i can feel it
you are just saving yourself when you hide it
yeah i know you care
i see it in the way that you stare
as if there was trouble ahead and you knew it
ill be saving myself from the ruin

bridge
i know it wasnt always wrong
but ive never known a winter so cold
now i dont warm my hands in your coat
but i still hope
cause this is how things ought to have been
and i know the worst of it wasnt all that it seemed
why cant i dream
why cant i dream

outro
cause i know you care
and i know you care
i know you care
i know you care
i know its always been there16embed
